description: six panels sewn together; cream ground with dark blue stripes with cream patterning and orange, red and lighter blue thin stripes; twisted fringed on short ends
markings: at one corner, on tag: [N-N-5 / Hausa herds-men use / it for shawl- / robe] and [6 panels stitched / tightly into one / piece 9 5/8\" each wide / 57 3/4\" wide x 85 1/2\" long]; at one corner, on sticker: [N-N-5 / HAUSA narrowband blanket / HAUSA herdsmen use them for shawl or robe. / Provenance:  Lagos]
title: Man's shawl
